event.title: Today, it's territory forms an enclave in the Navarre, a region of Spain, with which it shares

data.event: Today, it's territory forms an enclave in the Navarre, a region of Spain, with which it shares a 25 km border.
During the Peninsular War the Anglo-Portuguese Army led by the future Duke of Wellington breached the frontier and repelled the French troops who had stationed themselves in forts on La Rhune.
Since 1793 the only real development that has occurred began in 1990, and the population reached more than 2500 people in the 2010s.
